amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount authorized to be appropriated to the Department of Army for military construction projects at Fort Gillem, Georgia, $4,550,000 is available for the construction of a military police complex at Fort Gordon, Georgia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2463 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2463 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12509) To provide that, of the amount authorized to be appropriated to the Department of Army for military construction projects at Fort Gillem, Georgia, $4,550,000 is available for the construction of a military police complex at Fort Gordon, Georgia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2463 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2463 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
